## Client.getPeersWithDocKey property

`getPeersWithDocKey` returns the peers of the given document wrapped in an object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPeersWithDocKey: (peersMap: Record<string, Record<string, P>>, key: string) => Record<string, Record<string, P>>;
```
